palamuwaniwa jathika rajya sabhawe wishwasaya dina ganimata haki padanama yatathe agamathiwarayaku thora gatha yuthu bawada, janadhipathi dhuraya his wu witaka jathika rajya sabhawa wisin anuprapthikayaku thoranu labana thek thawakalikawa janadhipathi dhuraye wada baliya yuthu bawada sandahan wana awasthawaka dewaniwa prathama prathipaththi prakashanaya ho ayawaya lekhanaya parajayata pathwu wita agamathiwaraya illa aswiya yuthu bawa kiyawena thanaya.

kusal janith perera(nayaka), milinda siriwardhana (upanayaka), lasith malinga, kusal mendis, dimuth karunarathna, amila aponsu, sachithra serasinha, sachithra senanayaka, ashan priyanjana, lahiru gamage, nipun karunanayaka, sangith kure, ti.en.sampath, lahiru madhusankha, asitha pranandu, jefri wandarse, shehan madhusankha, rawindu gunasekara, kosala kulasekara, sahan nanayakkara, mahesh priyadarshana, di.ee. rathnayaka, nishan madhusankha, thisaru rashmika dilshan, winodan jon (kalamanakaru), sumithra warnakulasuriya (puhunukaru) tharaga kala satahana -
